title: Relaxation
subtitle: Relaxation is about letting go of tension and stress and bringing the mind and body into a state of calm and peace.

title: Concentration
subtitle: Concentration allows me to use my time productively, once I have relaxed: I focus on the thoughts I choose to have.

title: Contemplation
subtitle: Contemplation is reflecting deeply on myself, my inner world and my values; which keeps the true end in sight.

title: Realisation
subtitle: Realisation is when my understanding and feelings combine and I experience a more meaningful reality within.

title: Meditation
subtitle: Meditation is focusing on a thought and remembering my eternal identity, and re-awakening a wonderful state of well-being.
